request: Continue the template migration process. Currently 62 out of 133 templates (47%) have been migrated to unified_base.html. 71 templates remain unmigrated including 15 primepath_student templates, 9 placement_test templates, and various others. Need to complete migration to 100%, test migrations, update TemplateCompatibilityMiddleware, and document progress.

consolidated_recommendations.recommendation: Setup: Create test database backup, Set up test fixtures, Clear test cache
UI Testing: Test page rendering, Verify user interactions, Check responsive design, Validate forms
Validation: Run full test suite, Generate coverage report, Check for regressions, Document results

action_items.command: git add -A && git commit -m 'CHECKPOINT: Before agent-recommended changes'
coverage run --source='.' manage.py test && coverage report
